about.title: Who I am & how I work
about.who_body: I'm a full-stack developer focused on the frontend using React and Material UI. I have over three years of experience developing web applications, high-performance landing pages, and API integrations.
about.who_body2: At Miiii, I was responsible for developing the internal back office and corporate landing pages, as well as managing deployments and production maintenance. I then worked as a freelancer, building landing pages and applications with React, Angular, Tailwind CSS, and other technologies.
about.who_body3: I currently work at PBS as a Full Stack Developer, working in both the frontend and backend with PHP and MySQL, with a focus on scalability, code quality, and continuous improvement.
about.how_body: I like to work in teams, build quickly, measure results, and constantly optimize digital products. I prioritize clear communication, iterative deliveries, and readable and maintainable code.
